GSD.description:
udf: Fix preallocation discarding at indirect extent boundary

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit c8b6fa4511a7900db9fb0353b630d4d2ed1ba99c. For more details please see the references link.
